targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  c1 AS "time",
  v1
FROM mylog
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(c1)
ORDER BY c1

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time_sec,
  variable_value/600 as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  AND variable_name='CONNECTIONS-d'
  AND variable_value>=0
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(timest, '10m') AS time,
       variable_name as metric,
       avg(variable_value+0) as value
  FROM my2.status
 WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
   AND variable_name in ('THREADS_CONNECTED', 'THREADS_RUNNING')
 GROUP BY 1,2
 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(timest, '10m') as time,
  substr(variable_name,1,length(variable_name)-2) as metric,
  avg(variable_value+0) as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  and variable_name in ('SLOW_QUERIES-d', 'ABORTED_CONNECTS-d','ABORTED_CLIENTS-d')
  and variable_value>=0
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(timest,'24h') as time,
  variable_name as metric,
  avg(variable_value+0) as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  and variable_name in ('SIZEDB.TOTAL')
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(s1.timest,'30m') as time_sec,
  avg(1-s1.variable_value/s2.variable_value)*100 as value
FROM my2.status s1,  my2.status s2
WHERE $__timeFilter(s1.timest)
  AND s1.timest=s2.timest
  AND s1.variable_name='INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_READS-d'
  AND s2.variable_name='INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_READ_REQUESTS-d'
  AND s2.variable_value>0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(s1.timest,'30m') as time_sec,
  avg(1-s1.variable_value/s2.variable_value)*100 as value
FROM my2.status s1,  my2.status s2
WHERE $__timeFilter(s1.timest)
  AND s1.timest=s2.timest
  AND s1.variable_name='KEY_READS-d'
  AND s2.variable_name='KEY_READ_REQUESTS-d'
  AND s2.variable_value>0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(timest, '10m') AS time,
       substr(variable_name,5,length(variable_name)-6) as metric,
       avg(variable_value/600) as value
  FROM my2.status
 WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
   and variable_name in ('COM_SELECT-d', 'COM_INSERT-d', 'COM_UPDATE-d', 'COM_DELETE-d')
   and variable_value >=0
 GROUP BY 1,2
 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(timest, '10m') AS time,
       variable_name as metric,
       avg(variable_value+0)/600 as value
  FROM my2.status
 WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
   and variable_name in ('Bytes_received-d', 'Bytes_sent-d')
 GROUP BY 1,2
 ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT $__timeGroup(s1.timest,'30m') as time_sec,
  avg((s1.variable_value/(s1.variable_value+s2.variable_value))*100) as value
FROM my2.status s1,  my2.status s2
WHERE $__timeFilter(s1.timest)
  AND s1.timest=s2.timest
  AND s1.variable_name='QCACHE_HITS-d'
  AND s2.variable_name='COM_SELECT-d'
  AND s2.variable_value>0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time_sec,
  sum(variable_value+0) as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  AND variable_name like 'PROCESSES_COMMAND.Binlog Dump%'
GROUP BY timest
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time,
  variable_value+0 as value, variable_value/600 as value_sec,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  and variable_name in ($MyStatistics)
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(timest, '24h') as time,
  concat(' ',max(date_format(timest,'%H'))) as metric,
  sum(variable_value)/3600 as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE variable_name='QUERIES-d'
  and variable_value>0
  and $__timeFilter(timest)
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(timest, '1h'),$__timeGroup(timest, '24h')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(timest, '1h'),$__timeGroup(timest, '24h')

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time_sec,
  variable_value+0 as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  AND variable_name ='replication_connection_status'
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time_sec,
  variable_value+0 as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  AND variable_name ='replication_applier_status'
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timest) as time_sec,
  variable_value+0 as value
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(timest)
  AND (variable_name ='replication_worker_time' OR variable_name ='replication_max_worker_time')
ORDER BY timest ASC

SELECT
  c1 AS "time",
  v1
FROM mylog
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(c1)
ORDER BY c1

SELECT
  c1 AS "time",
  v1
FROM mylog
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(c1)
ORDER BY c1

SELECT
  c1 AS "time",
  v1
FROM mylog
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(c1)
ORDER BY c1

list.label: Custom Statistic
list.name: MyStatistics
list.query: select distinct variable_name from my2.status where variable_name is not null and variable_name <>'' order by 1

list.definition:
select concat('MySQL version: ',version(), '   Created at: ', date_format(min(create_time),'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,
  '  Started at: ', date_format(date_sub(now(), INTERVAL variable_value second),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) info
  from   information_schema.tables,performance_schema.global_status
 where variable_name='UPTIME'
 group by variable_value
list.name: MyVar2
list.query:
select concat('MySQL version: ',version(), '   Created at: ', date_format(min(create_time),'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,
  '  Started at: ', date_format(date_sub(now(), INTERVAL variable_value second),'%Y-%m-%d %T')) info
  from   information_schema.tables,performance_schema.global_status
 where variable_name='UPTIME'
 group by variable_value
